metadata.title: pypa/setuptools: Remote code execution via download functions in the package_index module in pypa/setuptools (important)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in the package_index module of pypa/setuptools. Affected versions of this package allow remote code execution via its download functions. These functions, which are used to download packages from URLs provided by users or retrieved from package index servers, are susceptible to code injection. If these functions are exposed to user-controlled inputs, such as package URLs, they can execute arbitrary commands on the system.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
python3-ImcSdk is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
